title: Genesis Gaming Announces HTML5 Bier Fest Video Slot in Advance of Oktoberfest
text:
Genesis Gaming
LONDON , September 14,
First Genesis slot game designed specifically for the mobile experience
Genesis Gaming is pleased to announce the launch of Bier Fest, a highly interactive video slot with a fun and seasonal theme. As Genesis Gaming's first HTML5 only game, this title has been optimized for the fast playing mobile customer. Multiple features in the base game keep players highly engaged creating the optimal mobile experience. This new game is exclusive to mobile and available via Quickfire.
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150914/266056 )
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150805/255608LOGO )
"Launching our first exclusively HTML5 game highlights our commitment to the mobile player," said Geoffrey Hansen , Managing Director of Genesis. "The mobile player has unique game experience requirements, needing more frequent and varied experiences in a short amount of time."
This game is available just in time for Oktoberfest , incorporating the essence of that legendary annual German Beer festival. The game lets you join delightful Bier Maidens, Bier Drinkers, an Oompah Band and Marzipan Pigs in the adventure of this action packed game. Players celebrate the great bier and food of Bavarian bier festivals with bonuses like the Bier Barrel Expanding Wild, where wilds expand to cover up to 3 reels with Stacked Wilds, Marzipan Pig Wild Race, which drops Random Added Wilds across the reels, and a Bier Mug Mystery Prize feature where mystery symbols are revealed and may award prizes as well.
"The focus on player engagement for this game can be seen immediately. We built in action and frequent features, many of which take place on the main game reels," said Scott Sims , Head of Global Design at Genesis Gaming. "And each of the features has fun animations to build anticipation."
The Bier Stein Free Spins awards up to 46 free spins with a maximum multiplier of 15X featuring all the base game features for many ways to win. Multiple base game features ensure there's always something occurring in the base game.
"Our experience launching many mobile titles has given us a keen understanding of mobile players," said James Watson , Director of European Sales. " Highly-paced game play and a smooth HTML5 interface is a great way to give these players exactly what they want."
